titleStmt.title: I, Distinctio 17, Pars 2, Tractatio quaestionum, Praeambulum
titleStmt.author: Bonaventure

edition.title: I, Distinctio 17, Pars 2, Tractatio quaestionum, Praeambulum

availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

editorialDecl.p: Encoding of this text has followed the recommendations of the LombardPress 1.0.0 guidelines for a critical edition.

change.p: Created file for the first time.

div.head: I, Distinctio 17, Pars 2, Tractatio quaestionum, Praeambulum
div.p:
Ad intelligentiam huius partis est hic ' quaestio de augmento caritatis, el circa hoc quaeruntur qualuor.
Prirao quaeritur, utrura carilas possit augeri secundum substantiam.
Secundo quaeritur de modo augmenti ipsius carilatis.
Tertio quaeritur de opposito augmenti ipsins, scilicet de diminutione, utrum caritas possil di- minui.
Quarto de augmento caritatis quantum ad ter- minum sive * statum.
